LanguageData.VV_Command_FertilizeAutoActivatedDesc: Sets whether settlers automatically use fertilizer when the plant's mana is below a certain level.
LanguageData.VV_Command_SetFertilizeAutoThresholdDesc: Sets the mana threshold to decide whether to use fertilizer. If the mana is below this threshold, settlers will use fertilizer up to the maximum limit.
LanguageData.VV_Command_CancelReserveWeaponDesc: Cancels the currently reserved weapon equip.
LanguageData.VV_Command_EquipWeaponDesc: Equips the selected weapon to the gunholder. Melee weapons or biocoded weapons cannot be equipped.
LanguageData.VV_Command_ActivateShieldDesc: Activates a shield that blocks incoming projectiles by consuming all available mana. The durability of the shield is proportional to the mana consumed and lasts for {0}.
LanguageData.VV_Command_NewGrowArcanePlantBillDesc: Starts the cultivation of a new arcane plant.
LanguageData.VV_Command_CancelGrowArcanePlantBillDesc: Cancels the scheduled arcane plant cultivation. If cultivation has already begun, the spent resources are non-refundable.
LanguageData.VV_Command_StartProgressDreamumVictoryDe: Plants a dreamum in the altar and starts the ritual for its magnification.
LanguageData.VV_Command_ToggleLayEggDesc: Sets whether or not this royal vivi spawns eggs.
